# ArchiTechs Registry - Component Documentation

A SolidJS component registry (shadcn/ui style) for distributing reusable components,
form blocks, libraries, and hooks via CLI installation.

## Quick Start

Initialize shadcn in your SolidJS project:
```bash
bunx shadcn@latest init
```

Install any component:
```bash
bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/<component-name>.json
```

---

## UI Components

### Button

**Name:** button
**Description:** Button component with variants, loading state, and button group support
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/button.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core, class-variance-authority, lucide-solid

### Card

**Name:** card
**Description:** Card container component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/card.json`

### Dialog

**Name:** dialog
**Description:** Modal dialog component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/dialog.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Dropdown Menu

**Name:** dropdown-menu
**Description:** Dropdown menu with submenus, radio groups, and checkboxes
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/dropdown-menu.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Select

**Name:** select
**Description:** Select dropdown component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/select.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Combobox

**Name:** combobox
**Description:** Searchable dropdown with autocomplete
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/combobox.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Date Picker

**Name:** date-picker
**Description:** Date selection component with calendar
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/date-picker.json`
**Dependencies:** @ark-ui/solid, @internationalized/date

### Color Picker

**Name:** color-picker
**Description:** Full-featured color picker with swatches and channel sliders
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/color-picker.json`
**Dependencies:** @ark-ui/solid

**Name:** table
**Description:** Table component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/table.json`

**Name:** sheet
**Description:** Slide-out panel/drawer component

**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core, class-variance-authority

### Checkbox

**Name:** checkbox
**Description:** Checkbox input component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/checkbox.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

**Description:** Toggle switch component

**Name:** input
**Description:** Text input component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/input.json`

**Name:** separator
**Description:** Visual separator/divider
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/separator.json`

**Name:** alert
**Description:** Alert/notification component

**Dependencies:** class-variance-authority

### Progress

**Name:** progress
**Description:** Progress bar component
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/progress.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Skeleton

**Name:** skeleton
**Description:** Loading skeleton placeholder
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/skeleton.json`

### Sonner

**Name:** sonner
**Description:** Toast notifications using sonner
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/sonner.json`
**Dependencies:** solid-sonner

### Carousel

**Name:** carousel
**Description:** Image/content carousel
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/carousel.json`
**Dependencies:** embla-carousel-solid

### Collapsible

**Name:** collapsible
**Description:** Collapsible/accordion section
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/collapsible.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Command

**Name:** command
**Description:** Command palette/menu (cmdk-style)
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/command.json`
**Dependencies:** cmdk-solid

### Context Menu

**Name:** context-menu
**Description:** Right-click context menu
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/context-menu.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Hover Card

**Name:** hover-card
**Description:** Card that appears on hover
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/hover-card.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

### Breadcrumb

**Name:** breadcrumb
**Description:** Navigation breadcrumb trail
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/breadcrumb.json`
**Dependencies:** @kobalte/core

## Blocks

### App Sidebar

**Name:** app-sidebar
**Description:** Responsive sidebar navigation with mobile support, keyboard shortcuts, and theme toggle
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/app-sidebar.json`
**Dependencies:** @solid-primitives/storage, @kobalte/core, lucide-solid

### Helper Components

**Name:** helpers
**Description:** Utility components for actions, empty states, loading states, and more
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/helpers.json`
**Dependencies:** debounce, lucide-solid

## Form Componentss

### Modular Form

**Name:** modular-form
**Description:** Form components integrated with @modular-forms/solid - includes input, select, combobox, date picker, color picker, and more
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/modular-form.json`
**Dependencies:** @modular-forms/solid, @ark-ui/solid, @internationalized/date, date-fns, solid-motionone, debounce

## Librarys

### Gatehouse

**Name:** gatehouse
**Description:** A flexible, zero-dependencies authorization TypeScript library supporting RBAC, ABAC, and ReBAC
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/gatehouse.json`

### Solid Convex

**Name:** solid-convex
**Description:** Reactive Convex integration for SolidJS with caching, optimistic updates, and SSR support
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/solid-convex.json`
**Dependencies:** convex, @solid-primitives/map

### Date Utilities

**Name:** date-utils
**Description:** Date conversion and parsing utilities for Dutch date format support
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/date-utils.json`
**Dependencies:** @internationalized/date, date-fns

## Hooks

### useBindSignal

**Name:** use-bind-signal
**Description:** Two-way binding hook for controlled components in SolidJS
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/use-bind-signal.json`

### useLoading

**Name:** use-loading
**Description:** Loading state hook with delayed activation to prevent flicker
**Install:** `bunx shadcn@latest add https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev/r/use-loading.json`

---

## Links

- Website: https://solid-registry.coolify.wearearchitechs.dev
- Based on: solid-ui (https://solid-ui.com)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS + Kobalte primitives

Generated: 2026-01-15
